name: Little Forest (Shane Bergeron)
description:
A fun casual city builder with some heavy scaling after a couple of days. Manage your resources carefully.

Programing, Project Management, and Design: Shane Bergeron (SlimeSouls)

3D models  and Design: Brian Homer (Current69)

Audio: John  (Rupschy)

2D art: Roger Tanton (SharpRabbit)
